welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Max, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore our quaint streets and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of this enchanting destination."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essey Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essey Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Metz-nancy-lorraine Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirecourt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirecourt Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
